body:
Hello everyone! It's been a while since we had a PlugDJ event, so I thought why not one this Friday? The theme will be dubstep. Bring you're favorite Monstercat, etc. and share it with the rest of us! The event will start at 6:30pm EST. Hope to see you there!

If you don't know what PlugDJ is, it's a fun place to share your music with others in a virtual club. If you haven't made an account, go to PlugDJ, make one and put together a playlist! Then when the event starts, go over to Avicus' PlugDJ and enjoy the party.

Please remember no joke or innapropriate songs. This is an official Avicus service, so all applicable rules apply.

title: PlugDJ Party! (Tonight)
